data.name: ERR_AsgOpenFailed_Version
data.value: This assignment was created with an earlier version of eJournalPlus, therefore it cannot be opened in Comment Mode. If you wish do upgrade this Assignment, first open it in Normal Mode, then re-publish it to eJournalPlus Server. After this you can open the new Published version in Comment Mode.

data.name: ERR_AsgToMergeAlreadyExists
data.value: The assignment you wish to import is already included in the current assignment.

data.name: ERR_CannotDelOthersAsg
data.value: Other person's assignment cannot be deleted

data.value: You must log in eJournalPlus Server before publishing your assignment.

data.name: ERR_MustSaveBefireAddingKM
data.value: Please save this file before adding a Knowledge Map. Are you sure to save this file and add a new Knowledge Map?

data.name: ERR_MustSaveBeforeMerge
data.value: Please save this assignment before merging another assignment.

data.name: ERR_MustSaveStudyBeforeAddingGuide
data.value: Please save this assignment before adding a guide image on new study. The application deletes the guide at this time.

data.name: ERR_WlsUrlInvalid
data.value: The Windows Live Spaces address is invald. Make sure you include the http:// part of the Url.

data.name: EX_UnhandledSaveFailed
data.value: Open the autosaved files if you failed to save assignments.

data.name: EX_WlsDLLLoadFailed
data.value: Necessary files for connecting Windows Live Spaces are not found. Publishing assignment on Windows Live Space is disabled. Please reinstall eJournalPlus client if you wish to use this function.
